title: Cannot teleport to wards from map - Eyefinity
body:
When selecting wards from minimap to teleport, nothing happens. They can only be selected on the game itself, though towers can be selected on the minimap.

Using eyefinity 3-screen with 5040x1050 resolution.

replies.body: I thought it was intended that Turrets are the only thing you can mouse over and TP to from the minimap; my assumption was that it's because Turrets are generally a safe TP zone that sometimes you need to hit while looking at a different area, and you get a CD reduction on the spell for it. Am I wrong or is it really a bug, that you're supposed to be able to mouseover wards on the minimap to TP?
